resources.string: Oops, An error occurred, Server could not return a response at this time, try again
Oops, An error has occurred from one of our servers, we are on it right away. Do check back shortly
Oops, the resource you are looking for could not be found on this server, kindly check and try again
Sorry, you do not have the right privilege to carry out this action. Kindly check with admin
Oops, You do not have an active internet connection. Check your connectivity settings and try again
